𓇋 I < VI < VL < fur < writ < reed

𒄀 GI 𓇇

𒊑 RI ⇔ 𒄀 GI 𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 cane ⇔ reed

𒆠 KI ⋍ 𒆤 KID ⋍ 𒋢 KUŠ ⋍ 𒄀 GI in

𒆠𒋢 ki-su
𒆠𒋢 a reed, footing, plinth

𒆠𒌅 ki-tu
𒆠𒌅 reed mat, flax

𒆠𒋾𒌅 ki-ti-tu kittel (woven) ⇔ قُطْن quṭn “cotton” 𒆤 kid/lil
